subject: The Skinny: Wednesday April 25, 2007
body:

  The Early Show | CBS Evening News | 48 Hours | 60 Minutes | The Saturday Early Show | CBS Sunday Morning | Face The Nation 







Rove Investigator Under Investigation 
The man who's 
      leading the federal investigation of White House political operations is 
      himself under investigation over his political activities.
And Democrats hire 200 staffers to 
      help with a spate of congessional investigations. Republicans 
      call it a "partisan witch hunt." 
Joel Roberts has the highlights of the day's 
      headlines.  More...
 

Joel Robertstheskinny@cbs.com
